participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and adventurous, enjoys outdoor activities and has a strong connection to nature.
participant_1.background: i like to listen to rock music while working. i help tend the fields. i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for literature and sports.
participant_2.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry.
